text: Robert Gregory "Greg" Evers (June 16, 1955 - August 21, 2017) was a Republican American politician. He served as a member of the Florida Senate from 2010 to 2016, representing parts of Northwest Florida. Before to his election to the Senate, he served as a member of the Florida House of Representatives, representing the 1st District from 2001 to 2010. Evers was killed in a car crash on August 21, 2017, near his home in Baker, Florida, aged 62.Florida State Senator Greg Evers killed in crash ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Road accident deaths in the United States Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Greg Evers
